name: 3dDepthMap
author: AFNI Developers
description: Calculates the Euclidean Distance Transform (EDT) for 3D volumes, allowing computation of ROI depth maps and applying various adjustments like masking and rimification.

inputs.name: Mask Dataset
inputs.description: Mask dataset, applied after the EDT has been calculated

inputs.name: Output Distance Squared
inputs.description: Output EDT values as distance squared

inputs.name: Ignore Voxel Dimensions
inputs.description: Ignore voxel dimensions, producing outputs as if each voxel dimension was unity

inputs.name: Rimify Output
inputs.description: Output a map of each ROI's boundary layer up to thickness RIM

inputs.name: Zeros Are Zero
inputs.description: EDT values only reported within nonzero locations of the input dataset

inputs.name: Zeros Are Negative
inputs.description: EDT values in the zero/background regions will be negative

inputs.name: Nonzero Are Negative
inputs.description: EDT values in the nonzero ROI regions will be negative

inputs.name: Bounds Are Not Zero
inputs.description: Treat FOV boundaries for nonzero ROIs as open (i.e., continue infinitely)

inputs.name: Run in 2D
inputs.description: Run EDT in 2D along the specified plane (axi|cor|sag)

inputs.name: Binary Only
inputs.description: Treat the input as a binary mask for a faster calculation
